name: Whisper Books
description:
Can't concentrate on reading? Movies are getting boring? Not even happy with new anime? Try a visual novel game!
Whisper Books tactfully embeds stunning plot and artistic presentation in the simplest play. Here, you will embark on an unparalleled journey! Come and immerse in our unique story and storytelling! Developers also hope that Whisper Books can serve as a stage on which authors demonstrate themselves, so we roll out a feature called the Audition of New Stories.

--Story List--

The Bee Effect

Genre: Fantasy, time travel, ancient China.
A righteous but depressed young man fancifully strayed into the world of bees and led his soul to salvation for lifetime. The principle of karma is illustrated deftly from ecological equilibrium. The story carries forward Chinese culture and advocates weight to science and environmental protection.

Circle of Nightmare

Genre: Fantasy, Viking, Transmyths.
A group of Vikings and a group of Chinese monks sailed to Vinland. While spreading knowledge to aborigines, they inadvertently impeded the devil’s plan to manipulate aborigines. So they were spotted by the devil. A war staged on, and a hell of cognitive disruption followed...
